obedient.translation[0].definitions[0].d: always doing what you are told to do, or what the law, a rule etc says you must do
obedient.translation[0].definitions[0].e: citizens who are obedient to the law
obedient.translation[0].definitions[0].n: In everyday English, people usually say that a child is good rather than obedient:
The children were all very good.
